StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: GWAS of Polycystic Ovary Syndrome Phenotypes

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The dataset(s) used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from the database of Genotype and Phenotype (dbGaP) found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap through dbGaP accession number phs000368. Samples and associated phenotype data for the Genome-Wide Association Scan [GWAS] of Polycystic Ovary Syndrome Phenotypes were provided by Andrea Dunaif, M.D.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: In accord with the NIH GWAS Policy for Data Sharing, and as expressed through the submission of the DAR, Approved Users acknowledge the NIH’s expectation that they will not submit findings using the GWAS of Polycystic Ovary Syndrome Phenotypes dataset(s), or updated versions thereof, for publication or presentation for a period of exclusivity for Contributing Investigators concluding with the Embargo Date identified on the dbGaP or other NIH genomic data repository homepage

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Genetic Analysis of Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
ConsentGroup.name: PCOS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Limited to research on genes that may be important for the development of polycystic ovary syndrome [PCOS]. They cannot be used to determine the individual identity of any person or their relationship to another person.

ConsentGroup.title: NUgene Biorepository
ConsentGroup.name: NUGENE
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Data from NUgene biorepository controls may be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems. No distribution to insurance companies.
